title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Gran Canaria, Spain
content:
Photo submitted by Tom Smulders, “Last year (Pre-Covid) we had the pleasure to travel through Gran Canaria with our 2 kids (3 months and 4 years). Beautiful Sunny days with the four of us.” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our readers around the world […]

The post Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Gran Canaria, Spain appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristi Benedict
